Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Whether a feature is selected into the current sprint

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Whether a user story is assigned to the sprint backlog

Name: activate_task
Description: Whether a task is activated (worked on) this sprint

Name: choose_product_owner_availability
Description: Discrete availability slot of the Product Owner for ceremonies

Name: set_team_capacity_points
Description: Team capacity in story points for the sprint

Name: allocate_testing_effort
Description: Effort units allocated to testing activities

Name: set_review_attendees_count
Description: Planned attendee count for sprint review

Name: prioritize_backlog_item
Description: Priority rank assigned to a backlog item

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Whether a worker is assigned to a specific task

Name: include_feature_in_release_plan
Description: Whether a feature is included in the next release

Name: set_ci_cd_deployment_target
Description: Select deployment target index for the development snapshot
